channel.title: Kubernetes on Anton Sizikov
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on Anton Sizikov

item.title: Using GitHub Container Registry with Kubernetes
item.description: GitHub Container Registry was introduced on the 1st of September 2020. It’s still in the Beta stage, so it’s rather not recommended to use it in production. However, it offers us free private storage for our Docker images, at least until the end of the Beta period.
